title: Could The Players Decided Next Years Victorious Skin
body:
Who would you have if you had a choice ... mine would be, 

champions that are actually used by everyone.. 

my pick would be either Lee, Jayce, Soraka, Ahri or Garen

Edit: im not saying we should have these^ theyre just what i would pick , I only say this is because from my knowledge Riot Pick "predominantly played" Champions of that season.. i dont believe that at all i see more people play Urgot ADC than Maokai hence why i made this Vote!
